analyzed: 'di ni ha cang mi ring mi thung ste //

analyzed: yan lag skyon bral 'di ni khyod la 'os //

analyzed: grangs dang yi ge shes bgyi tshul rnams dang // lag brda'i tshul dang gtsug lag tshul la mkhas //

analyzed: lus rnams kun nas rin chen rnam dag pa'i //

analyzed: 'di ni khyod kyi phyag rjed khyod la 'os //

original: mi yi 'jig rten gnas rnams ji snyed pa //

analyzed: sna tshogs kun la'ang 'di ni pha rol phyin //

analyzed: khyod kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid // 'di ni phrag dog ser sna ma mchis te //

analyzed: 'dod pa zhe dug mi ldang sdig mi bgyid //

original: bzod cing drang la mnyen zhing des pa ste //

translated: I will satisfy all those who come to me for help by giving away all my possessions.

analyzed: de ltar bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba la nan tan nyams su len pa'i tshe phyi nang gi dngos po gang ci yang rung ste /
translated: When I practice giving away all my possessions, there will be nothing, not even my own body, that I will not give away.

original: yongs su mi gtang ba de lta bu med pas de ltar ngas bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma yang sbyin par bya dgos //
analyzed: yongs su mi gtang ba de lta bu med pas de ltar ngas bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma yang sbyin par bya dgos //
translated: Therefore, I will give away my sons, daughters, and wife.

original: mig dang / mgo dang / rkang lag dang / yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad kyang yongs su gtang dgos na /
analyzed: mig dang / mgo dang / rkang lag dang / yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad kyang yongs su gtang dgos na /
translated: You will have to give away your eyes, your head, your feet, your hands, all your major and minor body parts.

original: de'i tshe khyod gzhan la byin na //
analyzed: de'i tshe khyod gzhan la byin na //
translated: When I give you away to others,

original: nga'i sbyin pa'i bgegs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nga'i sbyin pa'i bgegs su 'gyur ro //
translated: you will be an obstacle to my generosity.

original: bu yid du 'ong ba yongs su btang na /
analyzed: bu yid du 'ong ba yongs su btang na /
translated: When I give away my beloved child,

original: yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ro //
translated: you will be unhappy.

original: lus dang sems kyi sdug bsngal yang mang po zhig nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus dang sems kyi sdug bsngal yang mang po zhig nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: You will experience much physical and mental suffering.

original: nga la bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang bar byas na /
analyzed: nga la bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang bar byas na /
translated: When I give away all my possessions,

original: ser sna'i sems su 'gyur ro //üîΩnga'i yan lag dang / nying lag gtubs shing slong mo ba rnams la gtong ba'i tshe yid mi dga' bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ser sna'i sems su 'gyur ro // nga'i yan lag dang / nying lag gtubs shing slong mo ba rnams la gtong ba'i tshe yid mi dga' bar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: you will be stingy.

original: nam zhig na ngas khyod bor te /
analyzed: nam zhig na ngas khyod bor te /
translated: When I cut up my own body and give it away to beggars, you will be unhappy.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dus kyang yod de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dus kyang yod de /
translated: When I abandon you and go forth in the teachings of the TathƒÅgata,

original: de'i tshe'ang khyod yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe'ang khyod yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ro //
translated: you will be unhappy.

original: zhes nas rgyal bu gzi brjid bdag pos de'i tshe bu mo @161b dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
analyzed: zhes nas rgyal bu gzi brjid bdag pos de'i tshe bu mo @161b dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
translated: Then the prince TejorƒÅ≈õi spoke these verses to the girl RatiprabhƒÅsa≈õri:

original: ngas ni 'gro kun snying rje rab bskyed de //
analyzed: ngas ni 'gro kun snying rje rab bskyed de //
translated: ‚ÄúI have given rise to compassion for all beings

original: yun ring mchog nas byang chub rab zhugs pas //üîΩyang dag byang chub tshogs chen rgya mtsho rnams //
analyzed: yun ring mchog nas byang chub rab zhugs pas // yang dag byang chub tshogs chen rgya mtsho rnams //
translated: and for a long time have entered into enlightenment.üîΩI must complete the great ocean of the accumulations

original: tshad med thams cad yongs su rdzogs bya dgos //
analyzed: tshad med thams cad yongs su rdzogs bya dgos //
translated: for perfect enlightenment, all of them, without exception.

original: bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med par //
analyzed: bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med par //
translated: For oceans of eons, without end or middle,

original: mkha' ltar tshad med smon lam rnam sbyang zhing //
analyzed: mkha' ltar tshad med smon lam rnam sbyang zhing //
translated: I must purify my prayers, which are as vast as space.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i sa yi rnams //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i sa yi rnams //
translated: I must purify the grounds of the tathƒÅgatasüîΩfor endless eons.

original: bskal pa mtha' yas yongs su sbyang yang dgos //
analyzed: bskal pa mtha' yas yongs su sbyang yang dgos //
translated: I must train on the path of the perfections

original: rgyal ba dus gsum 'byung ba thams cad kyi //üîΩpha rol phyin pa'i lam la ngas bslab ste //
analyzed: rgyal ba dus gsum 'byung ba thams cad kyi // pha rol phyin pa'i lam la ngas bslab ste //

original: ye shes bla na med pa'i tshul chen gyis //
analyzed: ye shes bla na med pa'i tshul chen gyis //
translated: With the great method of unsurpassed wisdom

original: byang chub lam mchog rnam par sbyang yang dgos //
analyzed: byang chub lam mchog rnam par sbyang yang dgos //

original: phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing rnams thams cad kyang //
analyzed: phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing rnams thams cad kyang //
translated: in all the regions of the world.

original: kun nas nyon mongs rnam par sbyang bar bya //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs rnam par sbyang bar bya //
translated: I must eliminate all the unfortunate states of existenceüîΩand all the unfavorable conditions in all the worlds.

original: 'jig rten kun gyi mi khom thams cad dang // ngan song kun kyang rnam par bzlog dgos so //
analyzed: 'jig rten kun gyi mi khom thams cad dang // ngan song kun kyang rnam par bzlog dgos so //
translated: I must purify all sentient beings without exception,

original: nyon mongs bsgribs shing gti mug mun 'thoms pa'i //üîΩsems can kun kyang ma lus rnam sbyang dgos //
analyzed: nyon mongs bsgribs shing gti mug mun 'thoms pa'i // sems can kun kyang ma lus rnam sbyang dgos //
translated: who are obscured by afflictions and enveloped in the darkness of delusion.

original: sna tshogs thabs kyis yongs su sbyangs byas te //
analyzed: sna tshogs thabs kyis yongs su sbyangs byas te //
translated: I must purify them by various means

original: thams cad mkhyen lam tshul la dgod kyang dgos //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen lam tshul la dgod kyang dgos //

original: chags med sa rnams kun kyang ngas sbyangs te //
analyzed: chags med sa rnams kun kyang ngas sbyangs te //
translated: I must purify all the stages that are free from attachment

original: bskal ba rgya mtshor rgyal ba mchod par bya //
analyzed: bskal ba rgya mtshor rgyal ba mchod par bya //
translated: and make offerings to the Victorious Ones throughout the ocean of eons.

original: 'gro ba ma lus kun la byams bskyed de //
analyzed: 'gro ba ma lus kun la byams bskyed de //
translated: I must generate love for all sentient beings without exception

original: 'jig rten dag tu ma lus sbyin gtang dgos //
analyzed: 'jig rten dag tu ma lus sbyin gtang dgos //
translated: and give everything to the world.

original: slong ba kun nas 'dus shing 'ongs mthong nas //
analyzed: slong ba kun nas 'dus shing 'ongs mthong nas //
translated: When I see all the beggars gathered and assembled,

original: thams @162a *// cad gtang bar rtag tu brtson gyur na //
analyzed: thams @162a *// cad gtang bar rtag tu brtson gyur na //
translated: I will always strive to give everything away.

original: de'i tshe khyod ni nga sems mi mthun te //
analyzed: de'i tshe khyod ni nga sems mi mthun te //

original: zhum zhing dma' la 'jungs par mi 'gyur ram //
analyzed: zhum zhing dma' la 'jungs par mi 'gyur ram //
translated: Will you not become timid, low-spirited, and stingy?

original: nga yi mgo 'dod 'ongs par ngas mthong ste //
analyzed: nga yi mgo 'dod 'ongs par ngas mthong ste //

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod gyur na //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod gyur na //

analyzed: de tshe khyod ni sdug bsngal gdungs 'gyur gyi //

analyzed: 'di 'dra'i don thos rab tu brtan par gyis //

original: nga yi rkang lag gtubs pa mthong gyur na //
analyzed: nga yi rkang lag gtubs pa mthong gyur na //

original: khyod ni mi dga' de tshe slong ba la //
analyzed: khyod ni mi dga' de tshe slong ba la //

original: bud med ngang gis tshig drag mi bzod smra //
analyzed: bud med ngang gis tshig drag mi bzod smra //

original: don 'di thos shing sems la yongs su soms //
analyzed: don 'di thos shing sems la yongs su soms //
translated: Listen to this meaning and contemplate it in your mind.üîΩYou will have to give away your beloved possessions, your children,

original: phangs pa'i dngos dang de bzhin bu rnams dang // khyod kyang slong ba'i tshogs la sbyin dgos kyi //
analyzed: phangs pa'i dngos dang de bzhin bu rnams dang // khyod kyang slong ba'i tshogs la sbyin dgos kyi //

original: don 'di thos te mi dga' med na lta //
analyzed: don 'di thos te mi dga' med na lta //

original: khyod dga' thams cad de bzhin bya la rag /
analyzed: khyod dga' thams cad de bzhin bya la rag /

original: de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pas rgyal bu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pas rgyal bu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Having been thus addressed, the girl Pra≈õƒÅntaprabhƒÅsa≈õrƒ´ said to Prince Tejodhipati:

original: gzhon nu ji skad gsung ba de ltar bgyi'o //
analyzed: gzhon nu ji skad gsung ba de ltar bgyi'o //
translated: ‚ÄúYoung man, it shall be done as you say.

original: bdag ni / khyod ci dgyes pa dang / ci bzhed par longs spyod pa dang / gang du dgyes par mchi ba dang / thams cad du yang slad nam las pas rjes su 'brang ba dang / rtag tu zham ring sleb pa dang / don thams cad la brtson pa dang /
analyzed: bdag ni / khyod ci dgyes pa dang / ci bzhed par longs spyod pa dang / gang du dgyes par mchi ba dang / thams cad du yang slad nam las pas rjes su 'brang ba dang / rtag tu zham ring sleb pa dang / don thams cad la brtson pa dang /
translated: I will enjoy myself with you as you wish, and I will go wherever you wish. I will always follow you and be at your side, and I will be diligent in all matters.

original: thugs dang mthun par spyad pa dang / med par nyams su blang ba dang / mi mthun pa ma mchis par nan tan du bgyi ba'i tshul la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: thugs dang mthun par spyad pa dang / med par nyams su blang ba dang / mi mthun pa ma mchis par nan tan du bgyi ba'i tshul la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: I will practice in accordance with your mind, without being disobedient, and I will practice in a way that is not disagreeable.

original: zhes nas bu mo dga' ba'i @162b 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pas rgyal po'i sras gzi brjid kyi bdag po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
analyzed: zhes nas bu mo dga' ba'i @162b 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pas rgyal po'i sras gzi brjid kyi bdag po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
translated: ‚Äù Then the girl Pra≈õƒÅntaprabhƒÅsa≈õrƒ´ spoke these verses to Prince Tejodhipati:

original: bdag gi lus 'di sems can dmyal ba yi //
analyzed: bdag gi lus 'di sems can dmyal ba yi //
translated: Let my body be burned by the fires of hell,

original: zhugs kyis yongs gdungs zhu bar gyur kyang rung //üîΩkhyod spyod skal ba mnyam pa'i phyag rjed du //
analyzed: zhugs kyis yongs gdungs zhu bar gyur kyang rung // khyod spyod skal ba mnyam pa'i phyag rjed du //
translated: and let it be melted down by the molten bronze.üîΩIn all my lives, I will be your servant,

original: tshe rabs rgya mtshor bdag gis spro bar bgyi //
analyzed: tshe rabs rgya mtshor bdag gis spro bar bgyi //

analyzed: brtan dam sems kyis rab tu spro bar bgyi //

analyzed: ngang dge khyod kyis bdag gis khyim thab mdzod // khor yug ri yis bskal ba mtha' yas su //
translated: O virtuous one, be my husband.üîΩLet the CakravƒÅ·∏ça mountain cut off my head

original: bdag gi mgo ni yongs su btags gyur kyang //
analyzed: bdag gi mgo ni yongs su btags gyur kyang //
translated: for infinite eons,

original: sems la mi bde ma mchis dad par bgyi //
analyzed: sems la mi bde ma mchis dad par bgyi //

original: khyod kyis rtag par bdag gi khyim thab mdzod //
analyzed: khyod kyis rtag par bdag gi khyim thab mdzod //

original: khyod kyis tshe rabs grangs med thams cad du //
analyzed: khyod kyis tshe rabs grangs med thams cad du //

analyzed: bdag la thugs brtan thugs kyis mnga' mdzad de //

original: yan lag sha gtubs gzhan la stsal ba mdzod //
analyzed: yan lag sha gtubs gzhan la stsal ba mdzod //
translated: and cut off my limbs and give them to others.

original: khyod kyi chos la bdag kyang brtan gzhag gsol //üîΩbdag gi lus ni slad na ma las par //
analyzed: khyod kyi chos la bdag kyang brtan gzhag gsol // bdag gi lus ni slad na ma las par //

original: skyes bu lha yi sras po khyod la dbul //
analyzed: skyes bu lha yi sras po khyod la dbul //

original: bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe //
analyzed: bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe //

analyzed: de slad bdag kyang thugs rjes bzung ba mdzod // longs spyod don dang nor gyi don ma lags // 'dod spyod dga' ba @163a *//

original: bskyed pa'i don slad du //

original: sangs rgyas sras mang du mas mdun du bdar //

analyzed: dga' ba'i 'od ces bgyi ba rnam dag lus //

analyzed: khong du mchud do //

analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas par tshad med do //

analyzed: sems can gyi ming du bya ba thams cad kyi dbyings ltar tshad med do //
translated: It is as immeasurable as the realm of all the names of beings.

original: dus gsum gyi rgyud rgya mtsho'i dbyings ltar tshad med do //üîΩphyogs rgya mtsho'i dbyings ltar tshad med do //
analyzed: dus gsum gyi rgyud rgya mtsho'i dbyings ltar tshad med do // phyogs rgya mtsho'i dbyings ltar tshad med do //
translated: the ocean of the tantras of the three times is immeasurable like the realm of space;üîΩthe ocean of the directions is immeasurable like the realm of space;

analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyings ltar tshad med do // rigs kyi bu /

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnams kyi rnam par thar pa'i tshul gyi lus ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnams kyi rnam par thar pa'i tshul gyi lus ni /
translated: ‚ÄúNoble one, the body of the way of liberation of the bodhisattvas who are completely good

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang mnyam @177b pa'o; ;de ltar rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang mnyam @177b pa'o; ;de ltar rigs kyi bu /
translated: is equal to the domain of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: kho mos bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i sku la lta lta yang blta bas ma ngoms te /üîΩrigs kyi bu /
analyzed: kho mos bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i sku la lta lta yang blta bas ma ngoms te / rigs kyi bu /
translated: ‚ÄúNoble one, in that way, for as many eons as there are atoms in a buddha realm, I have looked at the body of the bodhisattva and have not had enough of looking at it.

original: 'di lta ste; dper na /
analyzed: 'di lta ste; dper na /
translated: ‚ÄúNoble one, it is like this:

original: sems kyi rgyud tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa las byung ba gtsang ba'i 'du shes pa dang / rnam par rtog pas mos pa las byung ba tshad med pa zhig skye'o //
analyzed: sems kyi rgyud tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa las byung ba gtsang ba'i 'du shes pa dang / rnam par rtog pas mos pa las byung ba tshad med pa zhig skye'o //
translated: They are the perception of purity that arises from improper mental activity and the immeasurable conceptual aspirations that arise from conceptual thoughts.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Noble one,

analyzed: de bzhin du kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i sku la lta na /

analyzed: ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'byams klas pa mtha' dang dbus med pa /

analyzed: tshad med par shin tu bstan pa /

original: gzhi sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
analyzed: gzhi sna tshogs dang ldan pa /

original: ri'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: ri'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /

original: sa'i gzhi'i rgyan sna tshogs bstan du yod pa /
analyzed: sa'i gzhi'i rgyan sna tshogs bstan du yod pa /

analyzed: sprin sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i nam mkha' kun nas khyab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa /

analyzed: tshul dang / ming dang / grangs sna tshogs su brjod pa /

analyzed: sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud sna tshogs 'byung ba /

analyzed: snying po byang chub kyi rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan @178a *//
translated: the various miraculous manifestations of the tathƒÅgatas turning the wheel of the Dharma,

original: sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
analyzed: sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
translated: the various adornments of the assemblies of the tathƒÅgatas,

original: mdo sde'i tshul sna tshogs shin tu bstan pa'i sgra 'byung ba /
analyzed: mdo sde'i tshul sna tshogs shin tu bstan pa'i sgra 'byung ba /
translated: the sounds of the various ways of the s≈´tras being taught,

analyzed: theg pa'i tshul sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa 'byung ba dang ldan pa /

analyzed: yongs su dag pa'i 'od dang / snang ba sna tshogs kyis rab tu snang pa /

analyzed: mtshan ma sngon chad ma mthong ba dag sems kyi skad cig re re zhing mig lam du snang ngo //
translated: and the various signs that had never been seen before appearing in his vision in every moment of thought.

original: ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa'i snying po byang chub kyi rgyan sna tshogs mnga' ba /
analyzed: ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa'i snying po byang chub kyi rgyan sna tshogs mnga' ba /
translated: From each of his pores, in every instant of mind, appeared oceans of buddhas, without end or middle, who were adorned with the ornaments of enlightenment,

analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa /

original: mdo sde'i tshul sna tshogs sgrog pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang ldan pa dag kyang rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul du sems kyi skad cig re re la mig lam du snang ngo //
analyzed: mdo sde'i tshul sna tshogs sgrog pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang ldan pa dag kyang rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul du sems kyi skad cig re re la mig lam du snang ngo //
translated: and who had various emanations of proclaiming the way of the s≈´tras.

original: ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang sems can rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa khyim dang / kun dga'i ra ba dang / ri dang / gzhal med khang dang / chu klung dang / rgya mtsho la gnas pa gzugs dang / lus sna tshogs can /
analyzed: ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang sems can rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa khyim dang / kun dga'i ra ba dang / ri dang / gzhal med khang dang / chu klung dang / rgya mtsho la gnas pa gzugs dang / lus sna tshogs can /
translated: From each of his pores appeared oceans of beings, without end or middle, who lived in houses, parks, mountains, palaces, rivers, and oceans, who had various forms and bodies,

original: longs spyod kyi yul sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
analyzed: longs spyod kyi yul sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
translated: who had various objects of enjoyment,

original: spyod pa dang / spyod yul dang / sbyor ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
analyzed: spyod pa dang / spyod yul dang / sbyor ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
translated: who had various conduct, fields of activity, and applications,

original: dbang po sna tshogs su grub pa'i tshul dang ldan pa dag kyang sems kyi skad cig re re la mig lam du snang ngo //
analyzed: dbang po sna tshogs su grub pa'i tshul dang ldan pa dag kyang sems kyi skad cig re re la mig lam du snang ngo //
translated: and the ways of the various faculties were present in the range of my vision in every moment of mind.

original: ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang dus gsum rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i tshul mtha' dang dbus med pa zhig mig lam du snang ngo //
analyzed: ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang dus gsum rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i tshul mtha' dang dbus med pa zhig mig lam du snang ngo //
translated: And in every pore of my body, the ways of entering the ocean of the three times without end or middle were present in the range of my vision.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rgya mtsho @178b mtha' dang dbus med pa zhig ni /üîΩrnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rgya mtsho @178b mtha' dang dbus med pa zhig ni / rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: The ocean of the bodhisattva‚Äôs vows without end or middle were purified.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang yongs su snang ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang yongs su snang ngo //
translated: The ocean of the various bodhisattva practices without end or middle were revealed.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang yongs su snang ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang yongs su snang ngo //
translated: The ocean of the pure bodhisattva perfections without end or middle were revealed.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang yongs su snang ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang yongs su snang ngo //
translated: The ocean of the bodhisattva‚Äôs previous practices without end or middle were revealed.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang yongs su snang ngo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang yongs su snang ngo //
translated: I perceived the ocean of the ways of purifying buddha realms without end or middle.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang yongs su snang ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang yongs su snang ngo //
translated: I perceived the ocean of the ways of the great love of the bodhisattvas without end or middle.

original: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i mthu dang / thabs rgya mtsho dag la'ang 'jug cing khong du chud do //üîΩbyang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po'i sprin gyi tshul rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang yongs su 'grub bo //
analyzed: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i mthu dang / thabs rgya mtsho dag la'ang 'jug cing khong du chud do // byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po'i sprin gyi tshul rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang yongs su 'grub bo //
translated: I entered into and comprehended the ocean of the powers of ripening and guiding all beings and the methods without end or middle.üîΩI accomplished the ocean of the ways of the clouds of the great compassion of the bodhisattvas without end or middle.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba'i shugs chen po rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang rnam par 'phel te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba'i shugs chen po rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang rnam par 'phel te /
translated: I increased the ocean of the great force of the joy of the bodhisattvas without end or middle.

original: sems kyi skad cig re re la yang sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i tshul rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang rab tu 'grub bo //
analyzed: sems kyi skad cig re re la yang sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i tshul rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang rab tu 'grub bo //
translated: In each instant of mind, I accomplish an ocean of ways to gather all sentient beings, without end or middle.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: ‚ÄúNoble one,

original: de ltar kho mo bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag tu byang chub sems dpa'i ba spu'i sgo re re zhing sems kyi skad cig re re @179a *//
analyzed: de ltar kho mo bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag tu byang chub sems dpa'i ba spu'i sgo re re zhing sems kyi skad cig re re @179a *//
translated: in that way, for eons as numerous as the atoms in a hundred buddha realms, in each pore of the bodhisattva, in each instant of mind,

analyzed: la chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la zhugs te /
translated: I have entered an ocean of ways of the Dharma, without end or middle.

original: khong du chud par byas kyang mthar thug par ma gyur te sngon khong du chud pa la bzlas te khong du chud par byas pa'ang med do //
analyzed: khong du chud par byas kyang mthar thug par ma gyur te sngon khong du chud pa la bzlas te khong du chud par byas pa'ang med do //
translated: I have not reached the end of comprehending them, but I have not repeated my comprehension of what I have already comprehended.

original: sngon thob pa las bzlas te thob par byas pa'ang med do //
analyzed: sngon thob pa las bzlas te thob par byas pa'ang med do //
translated: I have not repeated my attainment of what I have already attained.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: ‚ÄúNoble one,

original: de ltar don thams cad grub pa btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs shing /
analyzed: de ltar don thams cad grub pa btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs shing /
translated: in that way, SarvƒÅrthasiddha was dwelling in the midst of his harem,

original: bud med kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor bar bzhugs pa'i tshe'ang kho mo ni /
analyzed: bud med kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor bar bzhugs pa'i tshe'ang kho mo ni /
translated: When he was surrounded by a gathering of women,üîΩI entered into the ocean of the ways of the three times, without limit or center, through each of my pores, and I comprehended the ocean of ways of entering into the realm of phenomena.üîΩ‚ÄúNoble one, I know and I rest in this samƒÅdhi of bodhisattvas, the domain of the vision of the ocean of all the ways of the samƒÅdhis of bodhisattvas.üîΩI know and I rest in this bodhisattva liberation called the vision of the ocean of all the ways of the samƒÅdhis of bodhisattvas.

analyzed: khang pa brtsegs pa de'i dbus na yang khri nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi padmo'i snying po can /

analyzed: nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba las glang po dam pa'i gzugs su byas pa'i kha nas padmo'i dra ba 'byung ba dang ldan pa /

original: rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba tshangs pa'i gzugs su 'dug pa'i kha nas byams pa chen po'i tshul tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ror sgrog pa dang ldan pa /

original: rin po che sna tshogs shin tu mdzes pa'i gzugs kyi kha nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi legs pa rab tu rjod pa'i nga ro 'byung ba /
analyzed: rin po che sna tshogs shin tu mdzes pa'i gzugs kyi kha nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi legs pa rab tu rjod pa'i nga ro 'byung ba /
translated: From the mouth of the form of various beautiful jewels came forth the sound of praising the good qualities of the bright side.

original: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gser gyi dril gyi phreng ba las sgra snyan pa'i dbyangs su 'byung ba dang ldan pa /
analyzed: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gser gyi dril gyi phreng ba las sgra snyan pa'i dbyangs su 'byung ba dang ldan pa /

translated: there were garlands of various vajra bells, from which came the sound of all the bodhisattvas‚Äô aspirations;

analyzed: rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi phreng bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba'i dbyings sna tshogs tu sgrog pa /
translated: there were garlands of the king of jewels, the banner of the moon, from which came the sound of the various realms in which the reflections of all the buddhas appeared;

original: nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po snying po dag pa'i phreng bas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku tshe gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par bya ba /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po snying po dag pa'i phreng bas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku tshe gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par bya ba /
translated: there were garlands of the king of jewels, the pure essence, from which came the images of the lineage of the births of all the tathƒÅgatas of the three times;

original: rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying po'i phreng bas nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs kyi dbyings su 'od zer yongs su bstan pa /
analyzed: rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying po'i phreng bas nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs kyi dbyings su 'od zer yongs su bstan pa /
translated: with garlands of the king of jewels, the essence of the sun, illuminating the realm of the sky, the ten directions of the various buddha realms;

original: rin po che'i rgyal po snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi phreng bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba rab tu dbye ba /
analyzed: rin po che'i rgyal po snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi phreng bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba rab tu dbye ba /
translated: with garlands of the king of jewels, the banner of light, illuminating the mandalas of light of all the tathƒÅgatas;

original: nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po snang ba'i phreng bas sprul pa'i sprin 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po lta bu /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po snang ba'i phreng bas sprul pa'i sprin 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po lta bu /
translated: with garlands of the king of jewels, the light, like the sense organs of all beings, emanating clouds of emanations;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim gro byed pa'i 'od rab tu dgye ba /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim gro byed pa'i 'od rab tu dgye ba /
translated: emitting light that makes offerings to and serves the tathƒÅgatas;

original: rin po che'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi phreng bas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rnam par 'phrul bas skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par dgang ba /
analyzed: rin po che'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi phreng bas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rnam par 'phrul bas skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par dgang ba /
translated: with garlands of the king of jewels, the wish-fulfilling jewel, filling the realm of phenomena in every instant with the emanations of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra;

original: rin po che'i rgyal po ri bo'i rgyal mtshan gyi phreng bas lha'i dbang po thams cad kyi khyim gyi lha mo'i dbyangs snyan pa rab tu sgrog pa dang ldan zhing /üîΩkhri de dmigs pa thams cad @192a *//
analyzed: rin po che'i rgyal po ri bo'i rgyal mtshan gyi phreng bas lha'i dbang po thams cad kyi khyim gyi lha mo'i dbyangs snyan pa rab tu sgrog pa dang ldan zhing / khri de dmigs pa thams cad @192a *//
translated: It was adorned with garlands of precious jewels and victory banners, and the sweet sounds of the goddesses of the celestial palaces of all the lords of the gods resounded.

original: du de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa'i sprin 'gyed pas yon tan dang / legs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa brjod du yod pa dang / rin po che'i rgyan grangs med pa'i 'khor gyi stan gyis bskor bar mthong ngo //
analyzed: du de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa'i sprin 'gyed pas yon tan dang / legs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa brjod du yod pa dang / rin po che'i rgyan grangs med pa'i 'khor gyi stan gyis bskor bar mthong ngo //
translated: That throne was endowed with the sound of the praises of the TathƒÅgata, which arose from the clouds of the inconceivable qualities and virtues of all the tathƒÅgatas, and it was surrounded by countless precious ornaments and seats.

original: khri de la lha mo sgyu ma 'jig rten gsum las yang dag par 'das pa'i gzugs 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par gnas pa dang / srid pa'i rgyud thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad kyis rnam par dmigs su yod pa dang /
analyzed: khri de la lha mo sgyu ma 'jig rten gsum las yang dag par 'das pa'i gzugs 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par gnas pa dang / srid pa'i rgyud thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad kyis rnam par dmigs su yod pa dang /
translated: On that throne was MƒÅyƒÅdevƒ´, whose form transcended the three worlds, who was present in all worlds, and whose form was exalted above all the existences of beings, and who was visible to all beings.

original: 'jig rten thams cad kyis ma gos pa'i gzugs bsod nams yangs pas byung ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam zhing 'dra ba'i gzugs sems can thams cad la bzhin mngon par ston pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad kyis ma gos pa'i gzugs bsod nams yangs pas byung ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam zhing 'dra ba'i gzugs sems can thams cad la bzhin mngon par ston pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
translated: the form that arises from vast merit, unstained by the whole world; the form that is the same and similar to all beings, appearing to all sentient beings; the form that is suitable for ripening and training all beings, appearing directly to all sentient beings;

original: gdul bar mthun pa'i gzugs sems can thams cad dang mngon sum du 'dal ba dang / dus thams cad 'gro ba nam mkha' la rnam par dmigs pa tha mi dad pa'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad kyi mthas klas par dmigs su yod par byin gyis rlob pa dang /
analyzed: gdul bar mthun pa'i gzugs sems can thams cad dang mngon sum du 'dal ba dang / dus thams cad 'gro ba nam mkha' la rnam par dmigs pa tha mi dad pa'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad kyi mthas klas par dmigs su yod par byin gyis rlob pa dang /
translated: the form that is the blessing of the infinite perception of all beings in the sky, perceived in all times;

original: 'gro ba med pa'i gzugs 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad 'gag pa dang / 'ong ba med pa'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad du ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa'i gzugs @192b mi skye bar mnyam pa'i chos la brtson pa dang / ma 'gag pa'i gzugs 'jig rten gyi rnam par spyod pa thams cad la gzhol ba dang /
analyzed: 'gro ba med pa'i gzugs 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad 'gag pa dang / 'ong ba med pa'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad du ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa'i gzugs @192b mi skye bar mnyam pa'i chos la brtson pa dang / ma 'gag pa'i gzugs 'jig rten gyi rnam par spyod pa thams cad la gzhol ba dang /
translated: The form that is unceasing is the engagement in all worldly conduct.üîΩThe form that is correctly observed is the non-existence of the truth.üîΩThe form that is observed by the world is the non-existence of the lie.üîΩThe form that is not transferred is beyond death and birth.

original: yang dag par dmigs pa'i gzugs bden pa med pa dang / 'jig rten gyis rnam par dmigs pa'i gzugs rdzun pa med pa dang / 'pho ba med pa'i gzugs shi 'pho ba dang skye ba las 'das pa dang / mi 'jig pa'i gzugs chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa med pa dang /
analyzed: yang dag par dmigs pa'i gzugs bden pa med pa dang / 'jig rten gyis rnam par dmigs pa'i gzugs rdzun pa med pa dang / 'pho ba med pa'i gzugs shi 'pho ba dang skye ba las 'das pa dang / mi 'jig pa'i gzugs chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa med pa dang /
translated: The form that is indestructible is indestructible by the nature of the dharmadhƒÅtu.

original: mtshan nyid med pa'i gzugs dus gsum tshig gi lam du gzhol ba dang / mtshan nyid gcig pa'i gzugs mtshan nyid med pas byung ba dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa'i gzugs dus gsum tshig gi lam du gzhol ba dang / mtshan nyid gcig pa'i gzugs mtshan nyid med pas byung ba dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs pa dang /
translated: Form that is without characteristics is immersed in the path of the words of the three times. Form that has a single characteristic arises from the absence of characteristics. Form that is like a reflection is the mind of all beings and is observed in accordance with their thoughts.

original: rmi lam lta bu'i gzugs bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro bas dmigs pa la ma 'dres pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gzhol ba'i gzugs nam mkha'i dbyings ltar rang bzhin yongs su dag pa dang / snying rje chen pos byung ba'i gzugs sems can gyi rgyud thams cad yongs su @193a *//
analyzed: rmi lam lta bu'i gzugs bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro bas dmigs pa la ma 'dres pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gzhol ba'i gzugs nam mkha'i dbyings ltar rang bzhin yongs su dag pa dang / snying rje chen pos byung ba'i gzugs sems can gyi rgyud thams cad yongs su @193a *//
translated: The form that is like a dream is unmixed with the object, since it goes just as it is imagined. The form that is directed into the realm of phenomena is like the realm of space, its nature completely pure. The form that arises from great compassion is the complete continuum of all sentient beings.

original: bskyang ba la brtson pa dang / chags pa med pa'i sgos byung ba'i gzugs skad cig re res chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / mtha' dang dbus med pa'i gzugs rnyog pa med par 'gro ba thams cad la brten pa dang / tshad med pa'i gzugs tshig gi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa dang /
analyzed: bskyang ba la brtson pa dang / chags pa med pa'i sgos byung ba'i gzugs skad cig re res chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / mtha' dang dbus med pa'i gzugs rnyog pa med par 'gro ba thams cad la brten pa dang / tshad med pa'i gzugs tshig gi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa dang /
translated: The form that is like a dream is unmixed with the object, as it is as one wishes. The form that is directed into the realm of phenomena is like the realm of space, its nature completely pure. The form that arises from great compassion is dedicated to caring for the mindstreams of all sentient beings. The form that arises from nonattachment fills the realm of phenomena in each instant. The form that is without center or edge is unpolluted and supports all beings. The form that is immeasurable is beyond all verbal paths.

original: mi gnas pa'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad gdul ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis grub pa dang / byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i gzugs byin gyi rlabs kyis 'gro ba'i don la brtson pa dang / ma byung ba'i gzugs smon lam sgyu mas yongs su grub pa dang /
analyzed: mi gnas pa'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad gdul ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis grub pa dang / byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i gzugs byin gyi rlabs kyis 'gro ba'i don la brtson pa dang / ma byung ba'i gzugs smon lam sgyu mas yongs su grub pa dang /
translated: the form of nonabiding, which is accomplished through the blessing of guiding all beings; the form of nonblessing, which is dedicated to the benefit of beings through blessing; the form of nonexistence, which is accomplished through the illusion of aspiration;

original: zil gyis mi non pa'i gzugs 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i gzugs zhi gnas kyi snang bas rnam par dmigs pa dang / mi 'byung ba'i gzugs 'gro ba'i las ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang ba dang /
analyzed: zil gyis mi non pa'i gzugs 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i gzugs zhi gnas kyi snang bas rnam par dmigs pa dang / mi 'byung ba'i gzugs 'gro ba'i las ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang ba dang /
translated: the form of nonconquerability, which is superior to all worlds; the form of nonreality, which is perceived through the light of ≈õamatha; the form of nonoccurrence, which follows the karma of beings;

original: rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po ltar bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i smon lam yongs su grub pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad kyi yongs su rtog pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa dang /
analyzed: rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po ltar bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i smon lam yongs su grub pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad kyi yongs su rtog pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa dang /
translated: They are nonconceptual forms that remain in the world in accordance with beings‚Äô concepts.üîΩThey are nonconceptual forms that are perceived by all beings.üîΩThey are unobstructed forms that are dedicated to turning beings away from sa·πÉsƒÅra.

original: mi rtog pas rtog pa med pa'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad kyi rnam par dmigs @193b pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i gzugs 'khor ba las bzlog pa la rab tu brtson pa dang / rnam par dag pa'i gzugs de bzhin nyid dang mnyam par rnam par mi rtog pa dang /
analyzed: mi rtog pas rtog pa med pa'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad kyi rnam par dmigs @193b pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i gzugs 'khor ba las bzlog pa la rab tu brtson pa dang / rnam par dag pa'i gzugs de bzhin nyid dang mnyam par rnam par mi rtog pa dang /
translated: They are pure forms that are nonconceptual and equal to suchness.

original: rnam pa de lta bu'i gzugs gzugs med par gzugs su snang ba dang / tshor ba med pa'i gzugs kyis 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba la brtson pa dang / 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa'i gzugs sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pas rnam par dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu'i gzugs gzugs med par gzugs su snang ba dang / tshor ba med pa'i gzugs kyis 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba la brtson pa dang / 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa'i gzugs sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pas rnam par dmigs pa dang /
translated: They were forms that were not form, yet appeared as form; forms that were not feeling, yet were dedicated to the pacification of the feelings of suffering in the world; forms that were not perception, yet were perceived by the perceptions of all beings;

original: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i chos nyid kyis byung ba'i gzugs chos sgyu ma'i rnam pas grub pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i yul las yongs su 'das pa'i gzugs byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi ye shes las byung ba dang / rang bzhin med pa'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad kyi tshig gi lam la gzhol ba dang /
analyzed: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i chos nyid kyis byung ba'i gzugs chos sgyu ma'i rnam pas grub pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i yul las yongs su 'das pa'i gzugs byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi ye shes las byung ba dang / rang bzhin med pa'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad kyi tshig gi lam la gzhol ba dang /
translated: forms that were not formation, yet were created by the illusory nature of phenomena; forms that were beyond consciousness, yet arose from the wisdom of the bodhisattvas‚Äô aspirations; forms that were without inherent existence, yet were the path of words for all beings.

original: gdung ba yongs su bsal ba'i gzugs chos kyi sku bsil ba dam pa dang ldan pas lha mo sgyu ma bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su ston pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbang du 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam zhing 'dra ba'i gzugs kyi lus 'gro ba thams cad kyi gzugs kyi lus las 'phags pa ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo //üîΩde la sems can la las ni /

analyzed: chos kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba la phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa /

analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs pas byung ba /

analyzed: bsam gtan gyi yan lag dang tshul thams cad las yongs su grub pa'i sems dang ldan pa /

analyzed: bsam gtan gyi yan lag tha mi dad pa'i yul yongs su 'dzin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba rab tu thob pa /
translated: They had attained the illumination of the ma·πá·∏çala of the meditation of the tathƒÅgatas that is the domain of the indivisible branches of meditation.

original: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rgya mtsho bskam pa la shin tu gdon mi za bar byas pa'i nges par rtogs pa sna tshogs la gnas pa; de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par dbye ba'i tshul la mkhas pa /

analyzed: chos thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho rnam par dpyad pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa /

original: @195a *// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bas ma ngoms pa /
analyzed: @195a *// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bas ma ngoms pa /

original: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la rnam par lta ba'i rgyun mi gcod pa /
analyzed: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la rnam par lta ba'i rgyun mi gcod pa /

original: sangs rgyas thams cad lta ba'i sgo la mngon du gyur pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad lta ba'i sgo la mngon du gyur pa /
translated: He was facing the gateway to seeing all buddhas.üîΩHe was purifying the path that is accomplished by all tathagatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bsgrubs pa'i lam yongs su dag par bya ba; rnam pa tha dad pa'i tshul la mkhas pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bsgrubs pa'i lam yongs su dag par bya ba; rnam pa tha dad pa'i tshul la mkhas pa /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul nam mkha' dang mnyam pa /

original: sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i thabs kyi tshul la mkhas pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i thabs kyi tshul la mkhas pa /

analyzed: 'gro ba mtha' dang dbus med pa bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba'i snang ba rab tu thob pa /
